title: Sparkling Vaale - Diamond-Studded Bangle Set
materials: machine-made chain texture for enhanced sparkle. Finished with a signature Hyderabadi polish.
features: This delicate bangle set features a modern, minimalist design with alternating round and star-shaped diamond clusters set in prong settings. The fine chain texture adds a subtle, shimmering effect. The bangles are lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear.
occasions: Birthday Celebrations. Suitable for modern and contemporary attire.
description: Experience effortless elegance with this diamond-studded bangle set. The 22K gold and ethically sourced diamonds provide lasting value, while the comfortable design ensures a perfect fit. Perfect for everyday wear and special occasions, these bangles offer a modern twist on a classic silhouette. Durable and finely crafted for years of enjoyment.
